name: Silverback Strategies
description:
Silverback Strategies is a performance marketing agency located in Alexandria, Virginia. We measurably increase leads and sales for our clients through search, social and content marketing. 
Our relationships are built on regular communication, measurement, and reporting. Our number one goal is to ensure that your online performance consistently improves. We’re here to make you look great - to your customers, to Google and to whoever you answer to at the end of the day.
